text: Ba jod or ej Rasul, qissai zani Imron va duxtaraş Marjam va Iso alajhissalomro; to in ki tu rad namoī kasonero, ki da'vo kardaand, ki Iso Alloh ast jo farzandi Alloh ast. Cun guft zani Imron: Ej Parvardigori man, on ci ki dar şikam doram, ʙaroi Tu nazr kardam, In nazrro az man ʙipazir, ki Tu tanho şunavoī ʙa du'oi man va donoī ʙa nijati man
